General.Name: Volvo Car AB (publ.)
General.Description: Volvo Car AB (publ.) designs, develops, manufactures, markets, assembles, and sells passenger cars in Sweden and internationally. The company offers sedans and SUV vehicles under the Volvo brand; and electric cars under the Volvo and Polestar brands. It also provides vehicle parts and accessories, as well as sells online. The company was founded in 1927 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden. Volvo Car AB (publ.) is a subsidiary of Geely Sweden Holdings AB.

2.Name: Mr. Javier  Varela
2.Title: COO, Acting Head of Global R&D and Deputy CEO

3.Name: Mr. Henrik  Green
3.Title: Chief Product Officer and Head of Global Advanced Technology & Sustainability
